snippet: With professional golfers again walking the manicured course of the Masters Golf Tournament, President Obama added his voice to the chorus of people calling on the Augusta National Golf Club to admit women.
abstract: With professional golfers again walking the manicured course of the Masters Golf Tournament, President Obama added his voice to the chorus of people calling on the Augusta National Golf Club to admit women.

headline.main: Obama and Romney Enter Debate Over Augusta's All-Male Policy
headline.print_headline: Rare Point of Agreement, Inspired by Golf Match
